pages.text: 1. Farms and machines $(o)MUST$() have a killswitch, and must not be left running $(l)when the player is not at their base$()$(br2)2. Limit live entities to 30 or fewer$(li) Live entities are entities with AI. Some examples are bees, tamed pets, villagers, etc.

$(li)Limit the number of active Drygmies and Starbuncles to 20 or fewer apiece.$(l)$(o) These do still count towards your 30 live entity limit$()$(br2)3. All automatic storage transport must have a void upgrade or trash can attached to catch overflow
